summary: The Day of the Dead is a special holiday when people remember and celebrate their loved ones who have passed away. It's usually held on November 1st and 2nd in Mexico and other places with Mexican culture. Families gather to tell stories, share food, and visit graves. They decorate with colorful skulls and marigold flowers. This happy celebration includes gifts, special bread, and funny poems about friends and family. UNESCO has recognized it as an important part of world culture.
title: Day of the Dead
